name: outbreakAlertConfiguration
title: Outbreak Response Framework Configuration Wizard
subTitle: The Outbreak Response Framework solution pack uses the Outbreak Response Framework Configuration wizard to configure Threat Detection integrations within a FortiSOAR environment. The configuration process includes selecting a Threat Detection integration, such as FortiSIEM or FortiAnalyzer, and defining an investigation schedule for the outbreaks.
